other_title: ディアボリックラヴァーズ (Japanese)
plot: Yui Komori's father moves abroad, so he sends her to live in a new town with the six Sakamaki brothers. When she arrives at their mansion, she discovers that they are vampires. They abuse her psychologically and physically, often feeding off her. While she optimistically accepts her situation, she unravels mysteries both of their past and her own.
opening_theme: "Mr. SADISTIC NIGHT" by Hikaru Midorikawa and Kousuke Toriumi (eps 2-12)
